document_data.name: Island of the Free
document_data.mainbody: The '''Island of the Free''' was a small settlement located on an [[earthmote]] in eastern [[Tethyr]] near the [[Omlarandin Mountains]].
document_data.History: It was founded in approximately [[1462 DR]] by the escaped slave and former gladiator [[Azad the Free]]. The settlement's primary source of income and only claim to fame was the gladiatorial arena Azad constructed.  When [[Cephas]] returned to the island he freed the gladiators, many of whom decided to leave the settlement.
